SEARCH
Package SnakeGame

Class GameMap

java.lang.Object
GameEngine.GameObject
SnakeGame.GameMap
All Implemented Interfaces:
IRenderable
public class GameMap extends GameObject implements IRenderable
Represents the game map, where the game will take place and the GameObjects will be in. Provides the utility necessary to instantiate and do operations on a grid-like map. Holds the edge obstacles that maintain the snake from leaving the map. Is built such that the rendered map will have the width and height dimentions
See Also:

    • GameMap

      public GameMap(Rectangle mapRect, char drawChar, long seed) throws SnakeGameException
      Instantiates a GameMap Can't be close to origin since it has to generate surrounding colliders
      Parameters:
      mapRect - the rectangle to base the map on
      drawChar - the character used to draw the map
      seed - the seed for random usage
      Throws:
      SnakeGameException - if the map is instantiated in an invalid position

    • GameMap

      Instantiates a GameMap Can't be close to origin since it has to generate surrounding colliders
      Parameters:
      width - the width of the map
      height - the height of the map
      startPos - the position the map should start at
      drawChar - the character used to draw the map
      seed - the seed for random usage
      Throws:
      SnakeGameException - if the map is instantiated in an invalid position
